TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AsyncCompletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 MethodName 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the *MethodName* event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用的实现的类[基于事件的异步模式概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)，则类将提供*MethodName* `Completed`事件。If you are using a class that implements the [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), the class will provide a *MethodName*`Completed` event. 如果添加的实例委托到事件中，您将收到有关中的异步操作结果的信息相应的事件处理程序方法的参数。If you add an instance of the delegate to the event, you will receive information about the outcome of asynchronous operations in the parameter of the corresponding event-handler method. 可以检查客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托属性来确定是否已取消异步任务。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if the asynchronous task was cancelled. 可以检查客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托属性来确定异步任务的执行过程中是否发生异常。The client application's event-handler delegate can check the property to determine if an exception occurred during execution of the asynchronous task. 如果类支持多个异步方法或多次调用相同的异步方法，可以确定哪些任务引发*MethodName* `Completed`通过检查的值的事件属性。If the class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple calls to the same asynchronous method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 你的代码将需要跟踪这些令牌，称为任务 Id 对应的异步任务开始和完成。Your code will need to track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

para.span: 遵循基于事件的异步模式的类可以引发事件以向客户端的挂起的异步操作的状态。

span.span: Classes that follow the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern can raise events to alert clients about the status of pending asynchronous operations.

para.span: 如果此类提供*MethodName* 事件，可以使用需要了解客户端的异步操作的结果有关。

span.span: If the class provides a *MethodName* event, you can use the to tell clients about the outcome of asynchronous operations.

para.span: 你可能想要通知客户端比异步操作的结果的详细信息可容纳。

span.span: You may want to communicate to clients more information about the outcome of an asynchronous operation than an accommodates.

para.span: 在这种情况下，可以派生您自己的类从类，并提供附加的专用实例变量和相应的只读的公共属性。

span.span: In this case, you can derive your own class from the class and provide additional private instance variables and corresponding read-only public properties.

para.span: 调用方法，然后再返回属性值，该操作已取消或出错的情况下。

span.span: Call the method before returning the property value, in case the operation was canceled or an error occurred.

related.span: 实现基于事件的异步模式

span.span: Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作是否已被取消。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether an asynchronous operation has been canceled.

value.span: 如果后台操作已被取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the background operation has been canceled; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，异步操作已中断。When the property is `true`, the asynchronous operation was interrupted. 应检查客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托然后才能访问类中的任何属性的属性派生自; 否则为该属性将引发如果异步操作中断。The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise an if the asynchronous operation was interrupted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates the using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果提供派生类中的只读属性，请务必调用方法。

span.span: If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method.

para.span: 这会阻止客户端访问可能不是有效，因为异步操作中失败的属性。

span.span: This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

related.span: 实现基于事件的异步模式

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作期间发生的错误。

value.span: 如果异步操作期间发生错误，则为 实例；否则为 。

span.span: An instance, if an error occurred during an asynchronous operation; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果异步操作期间引发异常，则该类将分配到的异常属性。If an exception is raised during an asynchronous operation, the class will assign the exception to the property. 应检查客户端应用程序的事件处理程序委托才能访问类中的任何属性的属性派生自; 否则为该属性将引发使用其属性持有锁引用。The client application's event-handler delegate should check the property before accessing any properties in a class derived from ; otherwise, the property will raise a with its property holding a reference to . 值属性是`null`如果该操作已取消。The value of the property is `null` if the operation was canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]

para.span: 如果提供派生类中的只读属性，请务必调用中属性实现的方法。

span.span: If you provide read-only properties in a derived class, be sure to call the method in your property implementation.

para.span: 这会阻止客户端访问可能不是有效，因为异步操作中失败的属性。

span.span: This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 如果异步操作失败，则引发用户提供的异常。

span.span: Raises a user-supplied exception if an asynchronous operation failed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用中派生的类属性。The following code example demonstrates using in derived class properties. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#6)]

span.span: The property is .

exception.span: 该 属性已由异步操作设置。

span.span: The property has been set by the asynchronous operation.

exception.span: 属性持有对 的引用。

span.span: The property holds a reference to .

para.span: 如果具有派生您自己的类从类，只读属性应调用方法，然后再返回属性值。

span.span: If you have derived your own class from the class, your read-only properties should call the method before returning the property value.

para.span: 如果该组件的异步辅助角色代码将分配到异常属性或设置属性设置为，该属性将引发异常，如果客户端尝试读取其值。

span.span: If the component's asynchronous worker code assigns an exception to the property or sets the property to , the property will raise an exception if a client tries to read its value.

para.span: 这会阻止客户端访问可能不是有效，因为异步操作中失败的属性。

span.span: This prevents clients from accessing properties that are potentially not valid due to a failure in the asynchronous operation.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取异步任务的唯一标识符。

span.span: Gets the unique identifier for the asynchronous task.

value.span: 唯一标识异步任务的对象引用；如果未设置任何值，则为 。

span.span: An object reference that uniquely identifies the asynchronous task; otherwise, if no value has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类支持多个异步方法或多个调用单个方法，可以确定哪些任务引发*MethodName* `Completed`通过检查的值的事件属性。If a class supports multiple asynchronous methods, or multiple invocations of a single method, you can determine which task raised the *MethodName*`Completed` event by checking the value of the property. 你的代码将需要跟踪这些令牌，称为任务 Id 对应的异步任务开始和完成。Your code will need track these tokens, known as task IDs, as their corresponding asynchronous tasks start and complete. 在原始开始该任务的异步方法调用的过程设置此属性的值。The value of this property is set during the original call to the asynchronous method that started the task. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用以跟踪异步操作的生存期。The following code example demonstrates using an to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#11)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#12)]
